domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text: Back in late November I was very ill. All kinds of tests. Doctors said I must have some kind of rare flu only found in children. Then they said they couldn't identify it. It was a mystery to them. I wonder what it was?
